cline.customInstructions:
You are working with Claude Task Master MCP tools. Use these tools to manage project tasks:

- get_tasks: View current tasks
- add_task: Create new tasks
- update_task: Modify existing tasks
- set_task_status: Update task progress
- parse_prd: Generate tasks from requirements
- sync_readme: Update documentation
- help: Get tool information

Always check current tasks before making changes and keep documentation updated.
